name: qb-json-tok
description: Fast (~300 MB/sec) and light (~1.3 kb) JSON/UTF-8 tokenizer for creating custom parsers

scripts.ptest:
browserify perf/ptest.js > perf/ptest-bundle.js && echo 'Built. 
Open perf/ptest.html in a browser to run tests
'
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js > dist/qb-json-tok.js && cat dist/qb-json-tok.js | uglifyjs -c -m > dist/qb-json-tok.min.js

author: Matthew Voss
